definitions.definition: A pale brown mineral of the mica group, being a basic potassium aluminosilicate with the chemical formula K Al 2 ( Si 3 Al) O 10 (O H , F ) 2 ; used as an electrical insulator etc.

main_definition: ( mineralogy ) A pale brown mineral of the mica group, being a basic potassium aluminosilicate with the chemical formula K Al 2 ( Si 3 Al) O 10 (O H , F ) 2 ; used as an electrical insulator etc.
